page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: {Farming.Timber framed {architecture.Reciprocal {Services.Kinship Network Ours is predominantly a {Farming} parish,with most people engaged in farming,foresty,horticulture,the professions and service industries.The countryside is rolling and well watered with fields and woods.Our district is famous for its {Timber {Framed Architecture},and there are many cider apple orchards -mostly grown for Bulmers or a small local cider firm,just outside Pembridge. Although there is a very strong feeling for local traditions,the people here are very enterprizing,intelligent and freindly.There is a strong element of help-your-neighbours,you-may-need-his- help-one-day,and many transactions are based on reciprocal services,on barter
